de.samdev.absgdx.framework.menu

Interface MenuOwner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AgdxmlLayer, GameLayer, MenuLayer

    public interface MenuOwner
    This interface is the base of an menu/hud it can hold an tree of MenuElements The default implementer are MenuLayer (MENU) and GameLayer (HUD)
